name: Export Table
description: Export a data table defined on the crosstab area.

properties.name: filename
properties.description: Custom file name. WORKFLOW, GROUP and DATASTEP will be replaced by the workflow, group (subworkflow) and data step names, respectively.

properties.name: export_to_project
properties.description: Whether to upload a copy of the generated file to the project folder.

properties.name: time_stamp
properties.description: Whether to add a time stamp to the file name.

properties.name: decimal_character
properties.description: How to encode the decimal symbol.

properties.name: data_separator
properties.description: How to encode data separator in CSV files (default is a comma).
